attributes.action: Urge the Lawn Tennis Association and Wimbledon Tennis Clib to officially rename Aorangi Terrace to Henman Hill
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Although never a champion at Wimbledon, Tim Henman has reached the semi-finals of the championship four times, two of which were against Pete Sampras. He was also, for several years, ranked in the top 10 in the world. Very few people actually know the real name of Henman Hill, and it should therefore be officially renamed for future use.
